snippet: A federal judge has ruled in favor of the artist Robert Indiana, best known for his "LOVE" sculpture featuring a tilted letter "O," in a suit claiming that the artist had renounced work he had previously authenticated.
abstract: A federal judge has ruled in favor of the artist Robert Indiana, best known for his "LOVE" sculpture featuring a tilted letter "O," in a suit claiming that the artist had renounced work he had previously authenticated.

headline.main: Robert Indiana Wins Suit Over Hindi 'Love' Sculptures
headline.print_headline: Robert Indiana Wins Suit Over Sculptures
